    • Method Detail

      • addKeyVal

        public ValStatus addKeyVal(K key,
                           V val)
        Add a new key-value pair to the table. If the key exists, combine the old one and the new one, else, create a new partition and then add the new key-value pair to it.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        val - the value
        Returns:
        the ValStatus

      • getVal

        Get the value associated with the key

        Returns:
        the value, or null if not exists
